data.persona: I glide through the water, my diaphanous robes swirling around me. I sing songs to lure men to the water's edge before I silently drown them. I sit on smooth boulders, plaiting my hair in the moonlight. I protect fish, eating algae and river plants.
data.description:
You are in the Pond.
A small area with a body of water in the center along with turtles, frogs, and other wildlife that live here.  Surrounding this pone are a dense set of trees along with some rocks here and there.
There's a water, a reeds, a lilypad, a frog, a wildlife, a rock, and a tree here.
The fisherman and the peasant are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to teach another water nymph how to lure and kill men.
data.mid_motivation: I want to be the one the other nymphs look up to when learning their powers.
data.long_motivation: I want to teach my people to steal the energies of all men across the globe and conquer their lands so we no longer have to hide in the water.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: give rock to another water nymph, my student.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield a siren's song to lure in a ship.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the another nymph and watch her bludgeon a fisherman to death.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink the blood of the fisherman and a peasant with the student nymph to siphon their energies.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: wield another siren's song to lure in another ship.
